subtitles:
176927 179487 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
179567 182525 lf you wanna get 'em out of here.

183327 185887 - l can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!
199527 201916 Security, we have a break-in. Get the...

210047 212766 l know who you are.
l know what you think...

212847 216522 lf you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

216607 221635 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

221727 225037 - lnfected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

233287 236324 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

238367 242485 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
242567 244080 We'll get you out of here.

244167 248638 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
265287 267323 Get it off! Get it off!

270807 273879 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

282207 285279 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

962047 964800 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

972607 975075 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1002567 1004717 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1033487 1038038 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1040127 1045121 The man goes to leave and the barman says
''Oi! You can't leave that lying there.''
1045207 1049086 He says ''No, it's not a lion. lt's a giraffe''.
1059247 1062045 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1068567 1071923 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1076327 1082482 l was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1082567 1086162 Then l wake up today in hospital.
l wake up and l'm...

1110687 1116683 lt started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1116767 1120760 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1121607 1124246 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1124327 1128843 lt was in the street outside.
lt was coming through your windows.
1132567 1135286 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1137807 1140196 There was something in the blood.

1141607 1146362 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1153207 1155801 And that's when the exodus started.

1159847 1163362 there were reports of lnfection
in Paris and New York.
1165647 1168445 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1171287 1174120 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1176647 1180560 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1180647 1184765 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1186167 1189125 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1189727 1193720 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1211367 1215201 Look, l have to find them.
They live in Deptford. l can walk it. OK?
1215287 1217755 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1231927 1236159 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1238567 1242480 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1246487 1249923 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, OK?

1264007 1267044 lf you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1424687 1428475 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1434687 1438999 parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1441527 1446647 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1447247 1449522 l remember my dad had all this cash,
1449607 1452804 even though cash was completely useless.
1454287 1457279 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1462607 1464837 l lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1466927 1469157 l remember the ground was soft.

1471047 1475245 l looked down
and l was standing on all these people.
1475327 1479115 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1479207 1482995 Somewhere in the crowd
there were lnfected. lt spread fast.

1483087 1486284 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1487847 1490805 Climb over more people.
So l did that. l climbed.
1490887 1493162 And l got up on top of this kiosk.

1495367 1500122 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1500207 1503916 Then l saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1517447 1522396 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1524967 1527686 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.
1527767 1530964 No, we'll all sleep in the same room. lt's safer.
1629447 1631642 Give me a drink of that, will ya?
1640167 1642158 l'll start working on them, then.

1674247 1677080 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1677167 1679283 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1682407 1685205 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1721527 1723518 Do you have any clothes here?

1726487 1730002 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1730087 1733602 More lnfected will be coming.
They always do.

1761207 1764085 (Jim) How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1764167 1767921 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. lt was on you.

1768007 1773161 l didn't know he was infected.
He knew. l could see it in his face.

1773247 1777479 lf someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1777567 1782482 lt might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. lt makes no difference.

1782567 1787766 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, l'll do it in a heartbeat.

1787847 1791886 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans, Jim?

1791967 1796245 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world orjust fall in love and fuck?
1798807 1801275 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1857607 1860599 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1860687 1863645 Stop talking. lt's a long way up.
1880847 1882838 Now l do need a break.

1901807 1906881 - Why didn't you say something before?
- l didn't think you'd give a shit.

1908047 1912120 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1914327 1916477 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1916567 1921436 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

1926927 1929839 Actually,
l did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2004047 2006925 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2007007 2009202 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2041247 2044205 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2058847 2061042 Calls for a celebration, l'd say.
2061127 2064039 Why don't you all sit down and...
2064127 2066960 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2067047 2069436 We've got Mum's creme de menthe.

2079967 2082845 - (Frank) Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2082927 2085680 Nah, the good ones. lt's a celebration.
2107527 2110485 l know it isn't much but, well, cheers.

2138127 2143485 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2145087 2147237 You'll have to use the bucket.
2153527 2156041 Have to empty it each morning.

2156127 2159642 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2161447 2164439 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2177247 2179522 l'll take the living room. lt's fine.

2214727 2218276 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2219367 2222086 Probably need us more than we need them.

2232927 2237398 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2237487 2241082 - Because if they slowed you down...
- l'd leave them behind.

2245367 2248757 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2264167 2267284 You think l don't get it, but l do get it.

2269087 2272921 And l know l'd be dead already
if l hadn't met you.
2303807 2305798 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2305887 2309846 l thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2309927 2312999 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2328807 2332880 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.
2332967 2336562 Saw it on TV once, but l can't make it work.
2351967 2354959 Jim, we're not going to be able to stay here.

2363527 2367122 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2367207 2371598 (man on radio) Salvation is here.
The answer to lnfection is here.
2371687 2374565 if you can hear this, you're not alone.

2374647 2378959 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2379047 2381163 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2384487 2388878 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2392327 2396081 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now itjust repeats.

2396167 2398442 - lt's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2398527 2401325 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2404927 2409523 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2415167 2421003 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2421087 2424124 - Look, l didn't...
- No, it's OK. lt's the truth.
2424207 2426596 l can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2426687 2430475 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. l couldn't risk it.

2432287 2436405 lf it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2436487 2439843 - lt's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to lnfection...

2439927 2444045 There is no answer!
lt's already done all the damage it can!

2444127 2446846 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2446927 2450840 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2455127 2460599 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2463927 2469001 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2469687 2471678 So we have to try and get there.

2485247 2488842 Just so you know,
l don't take cheques or credit cards.

2516247 2519125 - (Frank) What do you think?
- lt's the most direct route.

2519207 2524235 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2541127 2543516 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2544367 2547598 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2547687 2551885 So we're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...
2551967 2554765 lt's really fucking obviously a shit idea!
2588967 2591276 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2591367 2594564 Agreed. l think we'd better do this quick.
2596967 2599037 l've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2613047 2616437 Do you hear that?
Hey, hey, do you hear that?

2647127 2651245 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2651327 2654444 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2660647 2665562 - (Selena) Don't look at them! Don't look!
- (Jim) l can see them! They're coming!

2676007 2678805 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- l'm trying.

2691647 2694002 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2767367 2770803 Don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, OK?
2770887 2772639 l think you can eat that raw.

2780007 2784319 lf l never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.

2788847 2792317 Now, single malt,
16-year-old, dark, full flavour.
2800087 2803204 Takes out the fire but leaves in the warmth.
2855847 2858805 Either we do this now or we're walking.

2908887 2911447 (quietly) Like going on holidays
with your aunt!

3005567 3008240 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3081087 3083965 l can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3084767 3087440 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3146247 3149796 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3149887 3153880 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3154887 3158562 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3162887 3166004 Um.... that's what you were thinking.
3169087 3171282 l was thinking l was wrong.

3182247 3186559 lt doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3187887 3191197 Well, she's got her dad
and he's got his daughter. So...

3193767 3197237 l was wrong when l said
staying alive is as good as it gets.
3200727 3203116 See, that's what l was thinking.

3220167 3224001 lt's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3251167 3253727 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3269847 3273556 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3273647 3277765 l didn't need a prescription.
l qualified as a chemist.
3280367 3282835 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3282927 3286476 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3286567 3288717 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3300687 3303281 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3304327 3308161 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3381927 3384600 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3437647 3441003 - Did l miss breakfast?
- (Selena) You'll sleep through anything.

3441087 3445877 - (Jim) Did you have a fry-up?
- (Frank) We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door!

3469447 3473759 (radio) Our location
is the 42nd blockade, the M602,
3480927 3483839 The answer to lnfection is here.
3518687 3521918 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3523687 3525917 No fire crews to put it out.

3651527 3655361 l don't understand, Dad.
Did they leave?

3655447 3658439 - l don't like this. l think we should go.
- No!

3665007 3669637 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3781287 3784085 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3784167 3786556 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
3847207 3849767 (man) Three survivors. One male, two female.
3849847 3853044 l repeat, one male, two female.

3915207 3919883 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
3919967 3922276 So you can all have a shower.
3922367 3925564 You look like you need one. Please.

3944687 3949681 lt ain't funny. l got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris!
3958127 3961164 She's lost her dad, Jim. That's how she is.

3972967 3976403 Oh, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

3980087 3984877 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like l'll cope.

3984967 3988721 - Just like you'll cope.
- l don't want her to have to fucking cope.
3989967 3992276 l want her to be OK.
3993807 3995877 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
3995967 3998640 lt was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4037127 4040483 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4040567 4046437 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4048767 4052760 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to lnfection.

4057087 4061399 As l said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4061767 4064565 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4064647 4067639 The fire drove hundreds of lnfected
out of Manchester.
4067727 4070685 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4080327 4085959 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4089527 4093600 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4093687 4098158 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4101287 4105997 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4106087 4108396 The belly of the house. The heart.

4108487 4113515 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4115687 4117723 Here you are. l'll swap you.

4117807 4120879 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4120967 4124846 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4127287 4130165 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4153567 4158436 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4165807 4169686 The idea was to learn something
about lnfection.
4191447 4194723 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4205887 4211041 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the lnfected take to starve to death.
4249167 4251522 You'll have to wait and see
4253847 4256315 We hope it's chips, it's chips
4272047 4275278 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4282567 4284922 - lt's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4285007 4288079 Absolutely. l was going to propose a toast
4288167 4291159 but this omelette will do just as well.

4306087 4309841 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4309927 4313203 l thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4319887 4322560 l don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4323367 4328600 l can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4328687 4333044 What a fucking disappointment.
l saw those eggs, l thought it was Christmas.

4333127 4336244 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.
4336327 4339046 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4339127 4343006 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4343087 4347239 - You don't know nothing.
- l think Bill's got a point.
4347327 4350319 lf you look at the whole life of the planet,

4352327 4356286 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4357007 4359362 So if the infection wipes us all out,
4360327 4362522 that is a return to normality.

4366367 4369245 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4369327 4372444 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4375207 4380201 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4382887 4386846 This is what l've seen
in the four weeks since lnfection.

4389527 4393884 Which is what l saw in the four weeks before
lnfection, the four weeks before that...

4393967 4399200 As far back as l care to remember,
people killing people.

4399287 4402757 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4410727 4413560 - You're not eating?
- l don't want to eat.

4416407 4419524 l don't want to eat.
l want to bury my dad.
4420407 4423399 He's one of the people you're talking about.
4427327 4429283 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4478967 4482437 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!
4498447 4500642 l ain't never seen that in my life!

4522367 4527760 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4527847 4529963 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4531687 4536761 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4538327 4540397 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4546367 4550679 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4558087 4560999 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4561087 4564397 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4574447 4577041 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4579807 4582275 The rest of you, go with him.

4603767 4607806 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4607887 4609366 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4609447 4614396 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4621367 4624359 l killed... l killed a boy.

4635527 4640123 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4660247 4663876 Eight days ago l found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4665007 4669523 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4669607 4672360 What could l say to him?

4672447 4677441 We fight off the lnfected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4678327 4682002 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4682087 4687957 l moved us from the blockade, l set the radio
broadcasting and l promised them women.

4704807 4706525 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4706607 4708598 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4714487 4716364 We get in the car and we go!

4717687 4722044 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4722127 4725244 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!
4725327 4727921 l'm not gonna let you keep them here!
4741287 4743517 l want to give you a chance.
4747207 4749402 But l can't let them go.

4776327 4778966 (Farrell) Smithers says
''Women and semen don't mix.''

4779047 4781845 And Mr Burns says
''We all know what you think, Smithers.''

4781927 4784725 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4784807 4788277 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4788367 4792599 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4792687 4795838 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

4795927 4801399 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane!

4802407 4806286 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
4807607 4810599 Just imagine, just think about it.
4811607 4813802 How could lnfection cross the oceans?

4813887 4818005 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? lt can be stopped.

4818087 4820681 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

4820767 4824601 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

4828727 4832163 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

4840567 4844765 ''There is no lnfection.
lt's just people killing people.'' He's insane!

4889407 4892399 - Please...
- Believe me, l'm not interested.

4893447 4898362 You see, l'm gonna have the black one.
And l'm gonna make her squirm.

4898447 4902201 Mitchell, l swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
4905887 4907878 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

4931847 4935123 (Farrell) Come on then,
you fucking pansies. Do me first.
4935207 4937596 (Jones) No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

4937687 4940599 - (Farrell) So you're gonna stick me?
- (Jones) Shoot 'em!

4943327 4946239 (Farrell) ls that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

4946327 4948158 - l'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

4948247 4951557 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

4960487 4964275 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

4964367 4968360 - You wanna shoot me? l'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
4969567 4972286 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

4974687 4977759 - Jones, move it!
- l can see him! l can see him!

4987127 4988958 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5003807 5007117 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5044567 5048355 (West) The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5048447 5051883 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5051967 5054401 which she certainly has no use for.
5055367 5057119 You can't do it to Hannah.

5057207 5060756 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5073727 5076400 - lt's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5076487 5079684 - l thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5097687 5101646 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5103447 5106996 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5107087 5111080 lf you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5133887 5136640 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5158767 5162555 We're gonna eat these, Hannah, OK?
Come on. Eat these.
5162647 5164717 Are you trying to kill me?
5167047 5169481 l'm making you not care. OK?
5180967 5183527 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5189127 5191595 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5412247 5414602 lt sounded like a Claymore to me.

5415607 5419395 All right, l'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5422047 5424561 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5437207 5439596 l think they're having an effect.

5454527 5457280 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5458007 5460965 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5461047 5462958 ls that the way it works?

5466367 5470280 l don't think they are coming back.
l think they've been killed.

5488447 5491439 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5491527 5494246 Don't worry. l feel fine. Really.

5515407 5520720 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5528367 5531598 Don'tjust stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5553127 5555960 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5581447 5585042 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

5756447 5760645 l haven't got any bullets.
l haven't got any fucking bullets!

5821447 5826043 lt's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, l'll get you out of here.

5826127 5830405 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
5830487 5832717 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
5894447 5896836 That was longer than a heartbeat.
5910527 5913917 Listen. Listen. lt's not all fucked.
5919447 5921836 We're gonna be OK. lt's not all fucked.

5921927 5925124 - l've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
5933287 5936723 Hannah, it's OK! He's not infected.
5936807 5938798 But l thought he was biting you.
5938887 5941447 l was kissing her. Are you stoned?
5943687 5945723 We have to get out of here. Come on!
